tool.name: Microarray Sim

param.name: gene_number
param.label: Number of simulated genes
param.help: Total number of genes that are simulated [default value: 10000]

param.name: samples_n1
param.label: Phenotype 1 samples
param.help: Number of samples with phenotype 1 [default value: 75]

param.name: samples_n2
param.label: Phenotype 2 samples
param.help: Number of samples with phenotype 2 [default value: 75]

param.name: up_ratio
param.label: ratio of UP genes
param.help: Proportion of up-regulated genes within differentially-expressed genes [default value: 0.5]

param.name: diff_genes_ratio
param.label: ratio of significative p-values
param.help: proportion of differentially expressed genes (genes related to phenotype) within all genes [default value: 0.1]

param.name: m1
param.label: m1
param.help: average difference between global mean and phenotype mean for highly differentially expressed genes [default value: 1.4]

param.name: m2
param.label: m2
param.help: average difference between global mean and phenotype mean for weakly differentially expressed genes [default vaule: 0.8]

param.name: seed
param.label: Random seed
param.help: Seed value: can be set to make the simulation reproducible [optinal parameter].

tool.help: This tool simulates microarray data with two conditions and known characteristics. Simulated data have similar behavior as those obtained with AffymetrixÂ® platform, after normalization (Log2 intensity).
